description: Extract messages from a specific range (start index to end index).

inputs.name: messages
inputs.description: Array of message objects to extract from

inputs.name: end
inputs.description: Ending index (exclusive, 0-based). Use -1 for end of array.

outputs.name: messages
outputs.description: Array containing messages from the specified range

outputs.name: count
outputs.description: Number of messages in the range
